PersistenceResultHandlerlink

Handling of responses from persistence operation

abstract class PersistenceResultHandler { abstract handleSuccess(originalAction: EntityAction<any>): (data: any) => Action abstract handleError(originalAction: EntityAction<any>): (error: DataServiceError | Error) => EntityAction<EntityActionDataServiceError> }
